import React from 'react'; import '../styles/style.css'; import "../styles/card.css"; import RecentReturns from '../components/RecentReturns'; const LostFoundForm = () => { const centerStyle = { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', textAlign: 'center', marginBottom: '40px', paddingLeft: '40px' }; const leftCardStyle = { borderRadius: "10px", // Rounded corners padding: "40px", // Space inside the card display: "flex", // Flexbox to center content flexDirection: "column", // Stack content vertically justifyContent: "center", // Center content vertically alignItems: "center", // Center content horizontally height: "100%", // Full height of the column backgroundColor: 'pink', paddingLeft: '40px' }; const rowfirst = { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', flexWrap: 'wrap', marginTop: '20px', width: '100%', }; const columnfirst = { flex: '1 1 50%', // 50% width for each column padding: '20px', }; const formCard = { backgroundColor: '#f4f4f4', borderRadius: '8px', padding: '20px', boxShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)', textAlign: 'left', maxWidth: '100%', }; const formTitle = { fontSize: '1.5rem', fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '10px', }; const formGroup = { marginBottom: '20px', }; const labelStyle = { fontWeight: 'bold', marginBottom: '8px', display: 'block', }; const inputStyle = { width: '100%', // Increased width padding: '14px', // Increased padding borderRadius: '8px', border: '1px solid #ccc', transition: 'border-color 0.3s ease-in-out, box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out', marginBottom: '10px', fontSize: '1.1rem', // Slightly larger text }; const buttonStyle = { padding: '14px 26px', borderRadius: '8px', border: 'none', backgroundColor: '#007bff', color: '#fff', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'background-color 0.3s ease-in-out, transform 0.2s ease-in-out', }; const imageStyle1 = { width: '100%', maxWidth: '400px', borderRadius: '8px', }; return (

Report a Lost Item

{/* Left Column with Card */}
Lost Item Report
  • Only the property lost on College or Hostel can be reported.
  • Maximum time for filing any lost report should be 2 days.
  • Try to be as detailed as possible.
  • Head towards the form below if you have lost your property.

); }; export default LostFoundForm;
